message.body: Hey lady, if I made us local bacon eggs and asparagus (or some combination thereof) after yoga, would that be an ok lunch for you?
I'm pretty sure I want to go to yoga but I am so exhausted right now I need to wait and see till morning. I am just waiting for the sun to go down so that I can go to bed!
Perfect!!!! I already ate a half a half pound of bacon. Lol Even if I don't make it to yoga you must eat bacon etc with me tomorrow. :)
Be round in twenty minutes, if that suits?xx
Yes, take your time. Text when you arrive!
